name: Game 12
description:
Explore some ruins as a ghost. WASD to move, mouse to look, left mouse button to also move forward

Uses a building in the Open Game Art set "Destroyed Walls" - https://opengameart.org/content/destroyed-walls-3d-models ,

By Open Game Art user LFA https://opengameart.org/users/lfa , which is Creative Commons By Attribution https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
